attributes.action: consider conducting investigations into the causes of recurrent miscarriages, without the parent/s suffering the trauma of multiple bereavements (3 miscarriages) before NHS intervention.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to invite all those, like me, who have been affected by this issue to join me in signing this petition. Currently a woman must suffer 3 miscarriages before she is offered medical investigations into  the loss of her pregnancies. This is both physically and mentally traumatic and unacceptable. Please sign this worthwhile petition and thank you for your support.
